ComicInfo.Title: Desolation Ward
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 4 of the 6-part "Serial Boxes." A cast member is brutally cut down by a sadistic killer, resulting in the most unlikely — and unwanted — Wildcats' reunion. And with the killer still on the loose, there's only one thought on their minds — revenge!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:21:26. [CVDB76622]
